examples: the heat deformed the plastic sculpture

definitions.text: twist and press out of shape
cause (a plastic object) to assume a crooked or angular form
examples: twist the dough into a braid
the strong man could turn an iron bar
The sidewalk deformed during the earthquake

definitions.text: alter the shape of (something) by stress
examples: His body was deformed by leprosy

definitions.text: assume a different shape or form
